text:
@CLewandowski_ @realDonaldTrump Weak the world with coronavirus.
They also buy clothing.
Companies around the world are weakening.
Buy them.
The Chinese Communist Party rules the world.
For this reason, virus terrorism continues.

It will continue until the world unites and defeats the CCP.
